instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
<SIGNAL>PP1V8_S0SW_DFR</SIGNAL>=1.797V
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_S0SW_DFR</SIGNAL>=3.313V
<SIGNAL>DFRDRV_12C_SDA</SIGNAL>=1.797V
<SIGNAL>MIPID_CLK_CONN_P</SIGNAL>=0.534V...
Still not working after changing touch bar ðŸ˜’

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
Any history available?
Did you do any checkings related with touchbar issue?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
The system doesn't wake up from sleep, j5250 is badly corroded i did a bypass solution and it's working fine..
I compare the diode mode reading to ground with good board everything seems fine

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
Do you get the critical update error?

[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/touchbar-critical-software-update-required.58379/[/URL]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message: Yes.. I tried it many times before I could get it done after the update touch bar stops working

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
So touchbar was working good?
What kind of update did?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
Touch bar was working before
The critical update that pops up when you're about to activate when choosing language

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> touch bar not working
threads.message:
So you've installed macOS, critical update error doesn't appear anymore, but touchbar doesn't work?

You've compared diode mode readings with good board.
What about signals level (voltage)?
